title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - February 1st, 2020
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - February 1st, 2020
description:
Featuring highlights from the latest issue of Bloomberg Businessweek:


Conversations with Hard Rock International CEO Jim Allen and NBA star Chris Paul .


Plus, we profile Brooklyn Nets owner Joe Tsai.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
